page.title: 13BROOK HILL HOUSE.
page.content: { BROOK HILL HOUSE}is situated on a hill surrounded by coniferous trees, on the outskirts of{BRIGHSTONE FOREST. It is a large,impressive building and is one of the local landmarks.The property may be seen from a distance as it is very prominant. This large residence was built in 1914 and was at one time inhabited by {J.B.PRIESTLY}.Recently the house was converted into a series of flats for holiday use.This move by the owner was not popular with the locals. Further local feeling has recently been aroused by the plans of the landlord to build bungalows in the grounds. The grounds of the the house are very extensive and include tennis courts.
